attributes.action: Put Lactase enzyme tablets on prescription for those who are lactose intolerant
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For those people who are lactose intolerant and need lactase tablets, they can be expensive to buy when you can often take up to 10 a day.
They are not available on prescription which would benefit those who are on benefits and can get precriptions for free and still cheaper for those who pay for prescriptions.
